attributes.additional_details: Education is important as it reduces poverty, boosts economic growth and increases income. It also increases a persons chances of having a healthy life, reduces maternal deaths, and combats diseases.
attributes.background: Education is our human right. Everyone deserves the chance to receive it. Education is the real key to success.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
